Claim: "A small girl with short brown hair is pushing a pink scooter."
Referring expressions: Small girl, short brown hair, pink scooter  Girl, beach
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsSmall(a) and HasShortBrownHair(b) and IsPushing(c)))) & (forall f (forall g ( IsOnBeach(f) ->  IsSmall(g))))) -> (exists d (IsOnBeach(d)))
